query.statement: SELECT CS306_TEM || '-' || CS306_RDT || '-' || CS306_SEQ ETN, CS306_SIR SIR, CS306_PST PST, CASE CS306_PST WHEN 'A1' THEN '작성' WHEN 'A2' THEN '반송' WHEN 'A3' THEN '전송' WHEN 'A6' THEN '승인' END PST_NM, CS306_MDT MDT, CS306_MID MID, ( SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = CS306_MID ) MID_NM, CS306_CDT CDT, CS306_NAM NAM, CS306_SPT SPT, CS306_PJT PJT, CS306_BSU BSU, CS306_ADR ADR, CS306_SPC SPC, CS306_HNT HNT, CS306_KND KND, CS306_SNT SNT, CS306_JMT JMT, CS306_SMT SMT, CS306_GMT GMT, CS306_NMT NMT, CS306_CMT CMT, CS306_AMT AMT, CS306_VAT VAT, CS306_TOT TOT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST306 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS306_TEM = #TEM# AND CS306_RDT = #RDT# AND CS306_SEQ = #SEQ# AND CS306_SIR = #SIR# AND CS306_DEL = 'N' WITH UR
